languages.text: "Тогда он сварил бальзам из отравленных трав и мертвецки напился. Свет в его взоре померк, и во тьме проступили фигуры усопших. Расс дал покойникам зарок мести, и огонь обиды в их сердцах угас. С тех пор мы провожаем мертвых так".

"Then he brewed a mixture of poisoned herbs and drank himself almost to death. The light in his eyes faded, and the figures of the dead appeared before him in the darkness. Russ swore an oath of vengeance before them, and the fire of resentment in their hearts went out. We have been giving our dead the same send-off ever since."
languages.original_text: "Тогда он сварил бальзам из отравленных трав и мертвецки напился. Свет в его взоре померк, и во тьме проступили фигуры усопших. Расс дал покойникам зарок мести, и огонь обиды в их сердцах угас. С тех пор мы провожаем мертвых так".

traits.locale_text: "Then he brewed a mixture of poisoned herbs and drank himself almost to death. The light in his eyes faded, and the figures of the dead appeared before him in the darkness. Russ swore an oath of vengeance before them, and the fire of resentment in their hearts went out. We have been giving our dead the same send-off ever since."

"Then he brewed a mixture of poisoned herbs and drank himself almost to death. The light in his eyes faded, and the figures of the dead appeared before him in the darkness. Russ swore an oath of vengeance before them, and the fire of resentment in their hearts went out. We have been giving our dead the same send-off ever since."

"Then he brewed a mixture of poisoned herbs and drank himself almost to death. The light in his eyes faded, and the figures of the dead appeared before him in the darkness. Russ swore an oath of vengeance before them, and the fire of resentment in their hearts went out. We have been giving our dead the same send-off ever since."

"Then he brewed a mixture of poisoned herbs and drank himself almost to death. The light in his eyes faded, and the figures of the dead appeared before him in the darkness. Russ swore an oath of vengeance before them, and the fire of resentment in their hearts went out. We have been giving our dead the same send-off ever since."

languages.text: “于是，他用有毒的草药调配了一种毒酒，差点把自己喝死。他眼中的光芒逐渐消失，在黑暗之中，那些死者的身影出现在他面前。鲁斯在他们面前发誓，说必将为他们报仇，于是死者心中的怨恨之火熄灭了。从那以后，我们一直以同样的方式为死者送行。”
languages.original_text: "Then he brewed a mixture of poisoned herbs and drank himself almost to death. The light in his eyes faded, and the figures of the dead appeared before him in the darkness. Russ swore an oath of vengeance before them, and the fire of resentment in their hearts went out. We have been giving our dead the same send-off ever since."

traits.locale_text: “于是，他用有毒的草药调配了一种毒酒，差点把自己喝死。他眼中的光芒逐渐消失，在黑暗之中，那些死者的身影出现在他面前。鲁斯在他们面前发誓，说必将为他们报仇，于是死者心中的怨恨之火熄灭了。从那以后，我们一直以同样的方式为死者送行。”

languages.text: 「そこでラスは毒草を混ぜたものを煎じて飲み、死の淵へと向かった。その目から光が消えると、眼前の闇に死者の姿が現れた。ラスが彼らを前にヴェンジェンスを誓うと、死者の心に灯っていた恨みの火は消え去った。以来、俺たちは同じように故人を送り続けてるんだ」
languages.original_text: "Then he brewed a mixture of poisoned herbs and drank himself almost to death. The light in his eyes faded, and the figures of the dead appeared before him in the darkness. Russ swore an oath of vengeance before them, and the fire of resentment in their hearts went out. We have been giving our dead the same send-off ever since."

traits.locale_text: 「そこでラスは毒草を混ぜたものを煎じて飲み、死の淵へと向かった。その目から光が消えると、眼前の闇に死者の姿が現れた。ラスが彼らを前にヴェンジェンスを誓うと、死者の心に灯っていた恨みの火は消え去った。以来、俺たちは同じように故人を送り続けてるんだ」

languages.text: «Entonces elaboró una mezcla de hierbas venenosas y bebió hasta estar al borde de la muerte. La luz de sus ojos se extinguió y en las tinieblas vio las figuras de los muertos. Russ prestó un juramento de venganza ante ellos y las llamas del resentimiento que albergaban en sus corazones se extinguió. Desde entonces, ofrecemos la misma despedida a nuestros muertos».
languages.original_text: "Then he brewed a mixture of poisoned herbs and drank himself almost to death. The light in his eyes faded, and the figures of the dead appeared before him in the darkness. Russ swore an oath of vengeance before them, and the fire of resentment in their hearts went out. We have been giving our dead the same send-off ever since."

traits.locale_text: «Entonces elaboró una mezcla de hierbas venenosas y bebió hasta estar al borde de la muerte. La luz de sus ojos se extinguió y en las tinieblas vio las figuras de los muertos. Russ prestó un juramento de venganza ante ellos y las llamas del resentimiento que albergaban en sus corazones se extinguió. Desde entonces, ofrecemos la misma despedida a nuestros muertos».

languages.text: « Il a donc préparé une décoction d'herbes toxiques qui l'a conduit aux portes de la mort. Son regard s'est éteint et les silhouettes des défunts lui sont apparues dans les ténèbres. Après qu'il a juré de les venger, les flammes de la rancune se sont éteintes dans leurs cœurs. Depuis, nous faisons la même chose pour aider nos morts à passer dans l'au-delà. »
languages.original_text: "Then he brewed a mixture of poisoned herbs and drank himself almost to death. The light in his eyes faded, and the figures of the dead appeared before him in the darkness. Russ swore an oath of vengeance before them, and the fire of resentment in their hearts went out. We have been giving our dead the same send-off ever since."

traits.locale_text: « Il a donc préparé une décoction d'herbes toxiques qui l'a conduit aux portes de la mort. Son regard s'est éteint et les silhouettes des défunts lui sont apparues dans les ténèbres. Après qu'il a juré de les venger, les flammes de la rancune se sont éteintes dans leurs cœurs. Depuis, nous faisons la même chose pour aider nos morts à passer dans l'au-delà. »

languages.text: "Dann braute er eine Mischung aus Giftkräutern und trank sich selbst fast zu Tode. Das Licht schwand aus seinen Augen, und in der Dunkelheit erschienen vor ihm die Gestalten der Toten. Russ schwor vor ihnen einen Eid der Rache, und das Feuer des Grolls in ihren Herzen verlosch. Seitdem gewähren auch wir unseren Toten genau diesen Abschied."
languages.original_text: "Then he brewed a mixture of poisoned herbs and drank himself almost to death. The light in his eyes faded, and the figures of the dead appeared before him in the darkness. Russ swore an oath of vengeance before them, and the fire of resentment in their hearts went out. We have been giving our dead the same send-off ever since."

traits.locale_text: "Dann braute er eine Mischung aus Giftkräutern und trank sich selbst fast zu Tode. Das Licht schwand aus seinen Augen, und in der Dunkelheit erschienen vor ihm die Gestalten der Toten. Russ schwor vor ihnen einen Eid der Rache, und das Feuer des Grolls in ihren Herzen verlosch. Seitdem gewähren auch wir unseren Toten genau diesen Abschied."

languages.text: "Sonra zehirli otlardan oluşan bir karışım kaynatmış ve ölene kadar içmiş. Gözlerindeki ışık sönmüş ve ölülerin suretleri karanlıkta önünde belirmiş. Russ onların önünde intikam yemini etmiş ve rahmetlilerin kalbindeki dargınlık ateşi sönmüş. O zamandan beri ölülerimizi aynı şekilde uğurlarız."
languages.original_text: "Then he brewed a mixture of poisoned herbs and drank himself almost to death. The light in his eyes faded, and the figures of the dead appeared before him in the darkness. Russ swore an oath of vengeance before them, and the fire of resentment in their hearts went out. We have been giving our dead the same send-off ever since."

traits.locale_text: "Sonra zehirli otlardan oluşan bir karışım kaynatmış ve ölene kadar içmiş. Gözlerindeki ışık sönmüş ve ölülerin suretleri karanlıkta önünde belirmiş. Russ onların önünde intikam yemini etmiş ve rahmetlilerin kalbindeki dargınlık ateşi sönmüş. O zamandan beri ölülerimizi aynı şekilde uğurlarız."
